DOC.brief_summary: To determine safety effectiveness low-dose therapeutic AEGR-733 +/- atorvastatin , ezetimibe fenofibrate ( compare placebo ) liver fat accumulation measure Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy
DOC.brief_title: Evaluate Low Doses AEGR-733 Hepatic Fat Accumulation MRS
DOC.detailed_description: The goal within current development program study investigate whether low dos AEGR-733 result significant reduction LDL-C TGs provide few gastrointestinal adverse event less hepatic fat accumulation see study higher dos . The potential atorvastatin , ezetimibe PPAR-alpha agonist ( fenofibrate ) ameliorate hepatic fat accumulation also investigate . The twelve week dose schedule allow u demonstrate long term effect low dos MTP-I hepatic fat accumulation .
DOC.criteria: 1 . LDLC 100 190 mg/dL 2 . Hepatic fat 6.2 % per MRS 1 . Pregnant lactating female 2 . Uncontrolled hypertension > 180/95 mmHg 3 . Chronic renal insufficiency serum creatinine > 2.5 mg/dL screen 4 . Liver disease ; i.e. , hepatitis , cirrhosis 5 . Major surgery within 3 month screen 6 . Cardiac insufficiency 7 . Hx malignancy basal squamous cell within past 5 yr 8 . Participation investigational drug study within 6 wks screen 9 . Prior exposure AEGR733 past 12 month 10 . Serious unstable medical psychological condition 11 . More one alcoholic drink per day 12 . Regular consumption grapefruit juice med know metabolized CYP 3A4 13 . Currently take corticosteroid 14 . Other lipidlowering med ( washout permit ) 15 . Fish oil , niacin grater 200 mg/day herbal weight loss product ( washout permit ) 16 . Acute CVD event within previous 6 month 17 . Diabetes Mellitus 18 . Hepatitis B C 19 . Medicated COPD 20 . Idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis 21 . G.I . disorder cause chronic diarrhea 22 . Fasting triglyceride =/ > 400 mg/dL 23 . Body Mass Index > 35kg/m2
